name: koa-session-minimal
description: Minimal implementation of session middleware for Koa 2. Inspired by and compatible with koa-generic-session

scripts.dist-test: babel test -d dist/test && sed -i 's@../lib/session@../..@' dist/test/*.test.js && mocha dist/test
scripts.cov: babel --plugins='external-helpers' lib -d cov && babel-external-helpers -l asyncToGenerator > cov/helper.js
scripts.cov-test: babel test -d cov/test && sed -i 's@../lib@..@' cov/test/*.test.js && istanbul cover -x cov/helper.js -- ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require cov/helper.js cov/test

author: Long
